segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool like he’s climbing a mountain, and it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying that plate like it’s the only thing that matters right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just flowing everywhere, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall any second now, and no one is going to catch him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, and the kids are going to get in trouble when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery, and someone is going to slip soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window makes the whole scene look so calm, but it’s anything but.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever realize what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
